GSD.description:
scsi: sg: Allow waiting for commands to complete on removed device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit f135c65085eed869d10e4e7923ce1015288618da. For more details please see the references link.
